tool_description: This tool converts PDF files into ZPL (Zebra Programming Language) format, which is commonly used for label printing.

api_list.name: pdf-to-zpl
api_list.description: Convert PDF to ZPL format for printing.

required_parameters.name: pdfBase64
required_parameters.description: The base64 encoded PDF file that needs to be converted.

required_parameters.name: width
required_parameters.description: The width of the label in inches.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: The height of the label in inches.
